urls.title: Sefton Council teams up with Environment Agency and United Utilities to fight flooding risk
urls.description: The collaboration after a major weather incident was declared in January

text:
A joint statement of intent has been signed by @seftoncouncil, @EnvAgency, and @unitedutilities to reassure Maghull communities that they are continuing to work together to explore solutions to reduce the risk of flooding.

https://t.co/0iWlljqWDy

urls.title: CaBA - Brand perception survey
urls.description: We want to understand what you know about the Catchment Based Approach (CaBA) if anything at all. If you have never heard of CaBA, this is useful information to us, so don't be shy and please do answer honestly! This survey should take around 5 -10 minutes, you are welcome to save your progress and return to the survey at any time. Please submit your final response by 5pm Friday 28th May.

urls.title: Environment Agency delivers £1.3 million boost to England’s fisheries - Government Opportunities
urls.description: Government Opportunities (GO) is the essential intelligence hub for all involved in buying for and supplying to the public sector. It delivers the latest news, reports, insight and cutting-edge analysis on the current and emerging issues affecting public sector procurement, finance and service delivery in the UK and further afield.

text: Environment Agency delivers £1.3 million boost to England’s fisheries https://t.co/wXPEeUvaVV via @GovOpps @EnvAgency #Fishing #Fisheries #Boost #Investment #Funding
